articles.description: Luis Rubiales refuses to step down as president of the Spanish football federation in the aftermath of his behaviour at Sunday's Women's World Cup final.
articles.title: Rubiales refuses to resign as Spanish FA president

articles.description: Manchester City sign Belgium winger Jeremy Doku, plus reports linking Mohamed Salah with a move to Saudi Arabia and Premier League build-up.
articles.title: Premier League news conferences plus transfers latest

articles.description: From soldiers watching his fights on the battlefields to a role model who could win presidential election - how Oleksandr Usyk brings joy to Ukrainians.
articles.title: How 'presidential' Usyk brings joy to the battlefield

articles.description: Watch the plays of the tournament from the 2023 edition of The Hundred as the group stages of the men's and women's competitions draw to a close.
articles.title: Root, Bouchier & Brook - Hundred plays of the tournament

articles.description: With the final Grand Slam of the 2023 season starting on Monday, BBC Sport looks at the key talking points from the US Open.
articles.title: Another Alcaraz-Djokovic epic? Can Gauff challenge Swiatek?

articles.description: Jacques Nienaber is masterminding South Africa's tilt at the Rugby World Cup, leaning on lessons learned as a teenage army recruit.
articles.title: Pranks, tanks and chance - Nienaber's path to Boks job

articles.description: Briton Daniel Dubois says he is ready to take the WBO, WBA (Super) and IBF heavyweight titles from Oleksandr Usyk on Saturday.
articles.title: Will underdog Dubois topple champion Usyk?

articles.description: Arsenal striker Folarin Balogun is nearing a £35m move to French side Monaco while defender Kieran Tierney is expected to join Real Sociedad on loan.
articles.title: Balogun nears £35m move; Tierney also leaving Arsenal

articles.description: Listen to BBC radio commentary from Gloucestershire v Lancashire in the One-Day Cup quarter-finals.
articles.title: Listen: One-Day Cup quarter-final - Gloucestershire v Lancashire

articles.description: Watch Portugal's Leandro Ramos end his javelin run-up with a somersault at the 2023 World Athletics Championships in Budapest.
articles.title: Ramos does somersault during javelin throw
